articles.content: "For me, Gayle is definitely not an automatic choice for starting," Ambrose had said on a radio show in Barbados. "When you look at his exploits over the last 18 months, he has struggled not only for… [+1491 chars]

articles.author: Daniel Moxon
articles.title: Australia opener Will Pucovski suffers 10th concussion leaving him a doubt for Ashes - The Mirror
articles.description: Pucovski is only 23, but is already in double figures for the number of concussions he has suffered while playing cricket
articles.content:
Australia opener Will Pucovski could miss the first Ashes test against England in December after suffering a concussion for the 10th time in his fledgling cricket career. 
The Aussies have big hopes… [+2518 chars]

articles.title: 'I told Shoaib Akhtar. Our team is solid. They'll easily beat you guys': Harbhajan ahead of India vs Pakistan T20 WC tie - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Harbhajan Singh has said that he has already warned former fast bowler Shoaib Akhtar that India are going to register yet another win against Pakistan at the T20 World Cup.  | Cricket
